solution_line_template: Olaf scored three times more points than his dad, which means he scored {dad_points} * {olaf_multiplier} = <<{olaf_multiplier}*{dad_points}={olaf_points}>>{olaf_points} points.
So in total, Olaf and his dad scored {olaf_points} + {dad_points} = <<{olaf_points}+{dad_points}={total_points}>>{total_points} points.
